name: Kai M.
quote: Always excellent. We've ordered from here since they opened and have always loved what we've gotten. This weekend we did a catering order for a party of 30 or so, and they were absolutely on top of their game. Everything was ready on time, cooked perfectly and packaged up really well for transport to the party. Recommend them grey highly indeed ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘
